documentation.text: @dev total number of IPFS address hash entries

@dev retrieve multihash entry associated with an nftIndex
 @param _nftIndex used as key
@dev returns the current number of IPFS hash entries in the system
@dev total number of IPFS address hash entries

@dev retrieve multihash entry associated with an nftIndex
 @param _nftIndex used as key
@dev returns the current number of IPFS hash entries in the system

devdoc.author: originally written by Forest Fang (@saurfang) - modified by Chris Ball original project: https://github.com/saurfang/ipfs-multihash-on-solidity
devdoc.details: Stores IPFS (multihash) hash by index (for NFTs) A multihash entry is in the format of:  <varint hash function code><varint digest size in bytes><hash function output> See https://github.com/multiformats/multihash Currently IPFS hash is 34 bytes long with first two segments represented as a single byte (uint8) The digest is 32 bytes long and can be stored using bytes32 efficiently.

EntrySet(uint256,bytes32,uint8,uint8).details: total number of IPFS address hash entries

getEntry(uint256).details: retrieve multihash entry associated with an nftIndex

numberOfEntries().details: returns the current number of IPFS hash entries in the system

setEntry(uint256,bytes32,uint8,uint8).details: associate a multihash entry with an NFT index. The index can be used across contracts

params._digest: hash digest produced by hashing content using hash function
params._hashFunction: hashFunction code for the hash function used
params._nftIndex: index is used as a key across contracts

devdoc.title: IPFSStorage
